name: we miss the moon (jayguisao)
description:
A short, experimental walking simulator about two girlfriends who are trying to find one another in a sea of disembodied voices. 

CREDITS:

made in 3 weeks by jay @Jason_Guisao and the infinitely talented jude: @garden_robot   (check out jude's itch.io here!: garden robot - itch.io)

main character mesh + rig made by akishaqs: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/abel-lowpoly-character-7e06c5d9035a45eea5185a577...

base meshes from the everything library by David O'Reilly.
